visibility.translation[0].definitions[0]: the distance it is possible to see, especially when this is affected by weather conditions
Visibility on the roads is down to 20 metres due to heavy fog.
The search for survivors was abandoned because of poor visibility.
visibility.translation[0].definitions[1]: the situation of being noticed by people in general
The exhibition helped increase the visibility of women artists.
visibility.translation[0].definitions[2]: the fact of being easy to see
visibility.translation[1].definitions[0]: the situation in which people notice a particular company, employee etc
A company can gain visibility by fostering boldness, risk taking, and growth.
In the past it was more difficult for women to achieve visibility.
